Parameters: boolean: True if this item should traverse all spans.
setFullSpan(boolean).Description: When set to true, the item will layout using all span area. That means, if orientation is vertical, the view will have full width; if orientation is horizontal, the view will have full height.

Returns: True if the View occupies all spans or false otherwise.
isFullSpan().Description: Returns whether this View occupies all available spans or just one.

Returns: The Span index of the View. If View is not yet assigned to any span, returns @B_android#support#v7#widget#StaggeredGridLayoutManager#LayoutParams#INVALID_SPAN_ID_E@.
getSpanIndex().Description: Returns the Span index to which this View is assigned.

ClassDesc: LayoutParams used by StaggeredGridLayoutManager. Note that if the orientation is @B_android#support#v7#widget#StaggeredGridLayoutManager#VERTICAL_E@, the width parameter is ignored and if the orientation is @B_android#support#v7#widget#StaggeredGridLayoutManager#HORIZONTAL_E@ the height parameter is ignored because child view is expected to fill all of the space given to it.
